attributes.action: Stop all immigration to the UK in these difficult times
attributes.additional_details:
At these difficult times I honestly believe that all immigration to the UK should be stopped completely, and under no circumstances should it be resumed.  As we haven’t  got enough housing, jobs or money for the people who already live here in the UK, it seems absolutely ludicrous  that we should allow any more people onto this already overcrowded island.

This has nothing to do with the colour, race, religion or creed of any individuals. I just can’t stress how outrageous that in these extremely difficult times, we the UK are still trying to shelter the rest of the world, when we can’t even look after our own.
